comment.comment: VJ FIND - executes when a line in the activity VJ is clicked
used for the activity list filter

add.query.add.query: depend.filename="problem" or depend.filename="incidents" or depend.filename="cm3r" or depend.filename="rootcause" or depend.filename="ocmq" or depend.filename="request"

link.expressions.link.expressions: if (not (null(resolution.code in $File))) then $query+=" and resolution.code#resolution.code in $File"
if (not (null(assignment in $File))) then ($query=" and assignment.groups=\""+assignment in $File+"\"") else ($query="")
if (not (null(assignment in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+assignment in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(company in $File)) and null(location.full.name in $File)) then (location.full.name in $File=company in $File;$fill.skip=true)

if (index("/", location.full.name in $File)=0) then ($ln.query="location.full.name#\""+jscall("StringUtil.escapeAllStr", location.full.name in $File)+"\"";$ln.query=nullsub($ln.query, "true")+" and level=0")

if (index("/", location.full.name in $File)>0) then ($L.tempx=0;for $L.ix = 1 to lng(location.full.name in $File) do (if (substr(location.full.name in $File, $L.ix, 1)="/") then $L.tempx+=1);$ln.query="location.full.name#\""+jscall("StringUtil.escapeAllStr", location.full.name in $File)+"\" and level="+$L.tempx)
if (not (null(operator in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+operator in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(opened.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+opened.by in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(updated.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+updated.by in $File+"\"")
if (not (null(closed.by in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+closed.by in $File+"\"")

$L.folders={};for $L.y = 1 to lng(denull(folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment)) do (if (5 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment~="never") then ($L.folders=$L.folders+{1 in $L.y in folders in tableAccess in $G.sm.environment}))
if (not (null(affected.item in $File))) then $query+=(" and logical.name#\""+affected.item in $File+"\"")
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if (not (null(category in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "category", category in $File, $G.imCategories, $G.imCategories.local, true)
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if (not (null(category in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "category", category in $File, $G.imCategories, $G.imCategories.local, true)
if (not (null(subcategory in $File))) then $query+=jscall("queryUtil.buildMLangLinkQuery", "subcategory", subcategory in $File, $G.imSubcategories, $G.imSubcategories.local, true)
if $G.multi then if (not (null(company in $File))) then $query+=" and (company=\"DEFAULT\" or company#company in $File)"
if (not (null(owner in $File))) then ($query=$query+" and name#\""+owner in $File+"\"")
if (cost.currency.code in $L.file~=NULL and cost.currency.code in $L.file~="") then $query+=(" and currency.code#\""+cost.currency.code in $L.file+"\"")

post.expressions.post.expressions: if ($probmgmt.candidate and resolution.code in $File="Solved by Workaround") then (prob.mgmt.candidate in $File=true) else (prob.mgmt.candidate in $File=false)
if null(initial.impact in $L.source) then (initial.impact in $L.source=default.impact in $L.target)
if null(severity in $L.source) then (severity in $L.source=problem.priority in $L.target)
